title: Fancy caps ... not your everyday font
content:
I appreciate your willingness to help me identify these fonts.

There are actually 2 fonts in question:  
"Tack Room Inc"  
"Your Horse Superstore"

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160050im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ID_4546.gif)

Font: 

 Raphael Standard. & Caslon Italic 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160050/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")
author: link

comments.content:
Your Horse Superstore is Caslon Italic:  
 [http://typophile.com/files/findfont\_1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160050/http:/typophile.com/files/findfont_1.jpg "http://typophile.com/files/findfont\_1.jpg")

Tack Room Inc. is Raphael Standard:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/raphael/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160050/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/raphael/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/raphael/")
I'm astounded! Thanks so much for sharing your time and talents. Resolution in just a matter of minutes!!! Incredible! Much appreciated, LinK
